scatter(x(:,1),x(:,2),'filled');
title('Scatter Plot of the Input Data','FontSize', 24);
mean_feature=mean(x);
disp(mean_feature);
std_feature=std(x);
disp(std_feature);
norm_pdf_x=normpdf(x(:,1),mean_feature(:,1),std_feature(:,1));
norm_pdf_y=normpdf(x(:,2),mean_feature(:,2),std_feature(:,2));
overall=norm_pdf_x.*norm_pdf_y;
figure;
scatter(x(:,1),x(:,2),70,overall,'filled')
colorbar;
threshold_value=0.02;
outlier_set=overall<threshold_value;
hold on;
detected=x(outlier_set,:);
scatter(detected(:,1),detected(:,2),70,'red','filled')
title('Anomaly Detection using Gaussian Distribution','FontSize', 24);
